General.Name: Sinomach Automobile Co Ltd
General.Description: Sinomach Automobile Co., Ltd. provides automotive trade and retail services in China. It trades cars under the import brands comprising Chrysler, Volkswagen, General Motors, Ford, Jaguar Land Rover, and Renault; and retails cars under import brands, including Jaguar Land Rover, BMW, Audi, Lexus, Infiniti, import Volkswagen, Chrysler, Jeep, Dodge, Mitsubishi, Renault, Ford, Toyota, and others. The company also exports vehicle parts, such as engines, chassis and body parts, and accessories. In addition, it provides car rental services. Further, the company offers financial, automotive aftermarket, engineering contracting, and engineering technical services in the field of automotive industrial engineering, etc. Sinomach Automobile Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Tianjin, China.
